allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove CPAL: pure CoreAudio implementation for direct device control

- Replace CPAL with native CoreAudio HALOutput for audio streaming
- Add direct device selection via AudioObjectID \(kAudioOutputUnitProperty_CurrentDevice\)
- Fix library cache reload on app restart \(init_cache now reloads TRACKS_CACHE\)
- Fix Hog Mode release on device disconnect
- Simplify audio_engine.rs by removing CPAL DeviceCapabilities
- Update backend trait: get_device_id\(\) replaces get_cpal_device\(\)

This gives full control over device routing for bit-perfect playback.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add track info panel with full metadata display

- Add "Informations" button to track context menu
- New side panel \(380px\) with slide-in animation
- Display: artwork, title, artist, album, quality badge
- Audio specs grid: sample rate, bit depth, bitrate
- Metadata: duration, format, year, track number, codec
- File path display with monospace font
- Quality badges: Hi-Res \(gold\), Lossless \(blue\), Lossy \(gray\)
- Auto-close queue panel when opening info panel

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
